Description.Text: Located in San Marco, Hotel San Luca is a perfect starting point from which to explore Venice. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Venice has to offer by making Hotel San Luca your base.
Located in San Marco, Hotel San Luca is a perfect starting point from which to explore Venice. Offer

IL CHECK-IN PER LA CAMERA ANNEXO DEVE ESSERE FATTO NELL EDIFICIO PRINCIPALE EL CHECK-IN DE LA HABITACION ANNEXO DEBE SER HECHO EN EL EDIFICIO PRINCIPAL CITY TAX NO INCLUIDA EN EL PRECIO PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL POR PERSONA Y NOCHETASSA DI SOGGIORNO NO INCLUSA NEL PREZZO PAGO DIRETTO NELL HOTEL PER PERSONA E NOTTE

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
